{{Quote|Glory to the Shogun!|The Shogunate}}
The {{Lang|'''Inazuma Shogunate'''|ja=稲妻幕府|ja_rm=Inazuma Bakufu}}, also simply called the '''Shogunate''', is the entity that rules [[Inazuma]]. It is led by the [[Electro Archon]], who is also known as the [[Raiden Shogun]]. Under the Inazuma Shogunate is the [[Tri-Commission]], the group of three commissions that oversee every matter in Inazuma.<ref name="A Path Through the Storm">{{Ref/Quest|A Path Through the Storm}}</ref>
